mapper.select: SELECT dabd.id, dabd.`name`, dabd.`code`, GROUP_CONCAT(ddpa.attr SEPARATOR ",") AS attr FROM djmall_auth_base_data dabd LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_product_sku_gm ddpsg ON dabd.`code` = ddpsg.product_type LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_product_attr ddpa ON ddpa.id = ddpsg.attr_id WHERE dabd.parent_code = #{parentCode} GROUP BY dabd.id
SELECT ddpsg.attr_id as attr_ids FROM djmall_auth_base_data dabd LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_product_sku_gm ddpsg ON ddpsg.product_type = dabd.`code` WHERE dabd.id = #{productId}
